Documents.Content: Patient admitted for chest pain. Diagnosed with acute coronary syndrome. Prescribed medication and follow-up in 2 weeks.
Blood Test: Hemoglobin 13.5 g/dL, WBC 7.2 x10^9/L. All values within normal range.
Claim submitted for inpatient hospitalization. Claim Amount: 120000 INR. Status: Pending.
Patient has given informed consent for angioplasty procedure.
